My work trip to Helsinki has helped broaden our partnership in education, investment, science, technology and innovation.
In meetings with President Niinistö @TPkanslia and Prime Minister @juhasipila, we deal with the next steps in relations between our countries.
Brazil and Finland already develop important educational projects. We want to further expand this effort. https://t.co/SaRmWeip1B
Education is the key to preserving and enhancing our social achievements, and our partnership with Finland will be central to this.

The attributions attributed to me in today's headline of the Party newspaper are completely false, fictional and malicious.
Those who recognize me know very well that I will not use such expressions and such a style even in my heaviest criticisms.
In the last period I follow with regret for some efforts to attract my person into daily political polemics.
I want you to know that our only wish is to have stability and refuability within the unity and unity of our country.

Bolsa Família completed 12 years ago yesterday. This means that Brazil has the 1st generation of children who are not hungry and are at school.
It is the largest social inclusion program in the world. Destined for the vulnerable, it keeps 36 million people out of extreme poverty.
Bolsa Família also guarantees that 17 million children and adolescents are in school and helped reduce child mortality by 58%.
Bolsa Familia is a top priority for my government, as it was for former President Lula.
The UN and the World Bank recognize the importance and success of the # FamilyFund.
Cutting the Bolsa Familia means attacking 50 million Brazilians who today have a better life because of the program.
We can not allow that to happen. I am sure that common sense will prevail in the allocation of resources to the program. #Family Bag
I regret the death of the Haitian Fetiere Sterlin last Saturday in Navegantes-SC, and I express my solidarity with family and friends
In a country like Brazil, known worldwide for solidarity and fraternity, hate crimes like this are even more unacceptable.
I reaffirm my government's repudiation of all forms of violence, hatred and intolerance.
I have determined that the Federal Police will assist in investigations so that those responsible are punished.
